items.value: Michael got lost at the Center!

* ATTTAAACCCCKKKKK *
Oh wait, you are not one of these bad boys!
What do you want .. oh .. a birthday card, for me?

Oh .. Romana .. i miss here .. since i am stuck here!
I cant leave but bring Romana this Birthday Cake.
Maybe after it come back to me, i could need your help.
i give you the Card and will bring Romana the Cake!
i am sorry but i cant help you right now!

Thank you so much, you're a great guy!
When you come back we can become friends.

You get:
1x Birthday Cake (for Romana)
1x filled Wallet (for you)

and now go to Romana and take care!
Thanks and see you soon Michael!

Please I need this birthday card!
I can't go to Romana's party without her ...

Come back when you have it!
Damn... i will be back soon!
